name: Real-Time Amazon Data
description: Fast and Simple product searches, data and reviews on Amazon.com in real-time.

api_methods.name: Search
api_methods.description: Search for product offers on Amazon with support for multiple filters and options.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query. Supports both free-form text queries or a product asin.

parameters.name: brand
parameters.description:
Find products with a specific brand. Multiple brands can be specified as a comma (,) separated list. The brand values can be seen from Amazon's search left filters panel, as seen [here](https://www.amazon.com/s?k=phone).

**e.g.** `SAMSUNG`
**e.g.** `Google,Apple`

parameters.name: min_price
parameters.description: Only return product offers with price greater than a certain value. Specified in the currency of the selected country. For example, in case country=US, a value of *105.34* means *$105.34*.

constraints.inter-dependency: min_price, max_price: min_price must be less than or equal to max_price.

parameters.name: max_price
parameters.description: Only return product offers with price lower than a certain value. Specified in the currency of the selected country. For example, in case country=US, a value of *105.34* means *$105.34*.

constraints.inter-dependency: min_price, max_price: min_price must be less than or equal to max_price.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description:
Sets the marketplace country, language and currency. 

**Default:** `US`

**Allowed values:**  `US, AU, BR, CA, CN, FR, DE, IN, IT, MX, NL, SG, ES, TR, AE, GB, JP`

parameters.name: category_id
parameters.description:
Find products in a specific category / department. Use the **Product Category List** endpoint to get a list of valid categories and their ids for the country specified in the request.

**Default:** `aps` (All Departments)

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description:
Return the results in a specific sort order.

**Default:** `RELEVANCE`

**Allowed values:** `RELEVANCE, LOWEST_PRICE, HIGHEST_PRICE, REVIEWS, NEWEST`

parameters.name: page
parameters.description:
Results page to return.

**Default:** `1`

api_methods.name: Product Details
api_methods.description: Get additional product information / details such as description, about, rating distribution and specs.

parameters.name: asin
parameters.description:
Product ASIN for which to get details. Supports batching of up to 10 ASINs in a single request, separated by comma (e.g. *B08PPDJWC8,B07ZPKBL9V, B08BHXG144*).

Note that each ASIN in a batch request is counted as a single request against the plan quota.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description:
Sets the marketplace country, language and currency. 

**Default:** `US`

**Allowed values:**  `US, AU, BR, CA, CN, FR, DE, IN, IT, MX, NL, SG, ES, TR, AE, GB, JP`

api_methods.name: Product Reviews
api_methods.description: Get and paginate through all product reviews on Amazon.

parameters.name: asin
parameters.description: Product asin for which to get reviews.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Find reviews matching a search query.

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description:
Return reviews in a specific sort order.

**Default:** `TOP_REVIEWS`

**Allowed values:** `TOP_REVIEWS, MOST_RECENT`

parameters.name: verified_purchases_only
parameters.description: Only return reviews by reviewers who made a verified purchase.

parameters.name: page_size
parameters.description:
Results page size.

**Allowed values:** `1-20`

**Default:** `10`

parameters.name: page
parameters.description:
Results page to return.

**Default:** `1`

parameters.name: star_rating
parameters.description:
Only return reviews with a specific star rating.

**Default:** `ALL`

**Allowed values:** `ALL, 5_STARS, 4_STARS, 3_STARS, 2_STARS, 1_STARS, POSITIVE, CRITICAL`

parameters.name: images_or_videos_only
parameters.description: Only return reviews containing images and / or videos.

parameters.name: country
parameters.description:
Sets the marketplace country, language and currency. 

**Default:** `US`

**Allowed values:**  `US, AU, BR, CA, CN, FR, DE, IN, IT, MX, NL, SG, ES, TR, AE, GB, JP`

api_methods.name: Product Category List
api_methods.description: Get Amazon product categories (per country / marketplace).

parameters.name: country
parameters.description:
Sets the marketplace country, language and currency. 

**Default:** `US`

**Allowed values:**  `US, AU, BR, CA, CN, FR, DE, IN, IT, MX, NL, SG, ES, TR, AE, GB, JP`

api_methods.name: Product Offers
api_methods.description: Get top 10 offers of a specific product on Amazon by its asin, the first offer in the list is the pinned offer returned by the **Search** endpoint. Supports filtering by product condition.

parameters.name: asin
parameters.description:
Product ASIN for which to get offers. Supports batching of up to 10 ASINs in a single request, separated by comma (e.g. *B08PPDJWC8,B07ZPKBL9V, B08BHXG144*).

Note that each ASIN in a batch request is counted as a single request against the plan quota.

parameters.name: delivery
parameters.description:
[EXPERIMENTAL]
Find products with specific delivery option, specified as a comma delimited list of the following values: `PRIME_ELIGIBLE,FREE_DELIVERY`.

**e.g.** `FREE_DELIVERY`
**e.g.** `PRIME_ELIGIBLE,FREE_DELIVERY`

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description:
Maximum number of offers to return.

**Default:** `100`

parameters.name: product_condition
parameters.description:
Find products in specific conditions, specified as a comma delimited list of the following values: `NEW, USED_LIKE_NEW, USED_VERY_GOOD, USED_GOOD, USED_ACCEPTABLE`.

**e.g.** `NEW,USED_LIKE_NEW`
**e.g.** `USED_VERY_GOOD,USED_GOOD,USED_LIKE_NEW`

parameters.name: country
parameters.description:
Sets the marketplace country, language and currency. 

**Default:** `US`

**Allowed values:**  `US, AU, BR, CA, CN, FR, DE, IN, IT, MX, NL, SG, ES, TR, AE, GB, JP`
